mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.category_id AS "category.id", a.title AS "title", a.image AS "image", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.description AS "description", a.hits AS "hits", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.msg_type AS "msgType", a.des_json AS "desJson", c.name AS "category.name", u.name AS "user.name"
JOIN cms_category c ON c.id = a.category_id JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = c.office_id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_article( id, category_id, title, image, keywords, description, des_json, msg_type, hits, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{category.id}, #{title}, #{image}, #{keywords}, #{description}, #{desJson}, #{msgType}, #{hits}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_article SET category_id = #{category.id}, title = #{title}, image = #{image}, keywords = #{keywords}, description = #{description}, des_json = #{desJson}, msg_type = #{msgType}, hits = #{hits}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
